newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Geneva airport traffic down 11.3pct in Dec 96.
newsitem.headline: Geneva airport traffic down 11.3pct in Dec 96.

text.p: Geneva's Cointrin airport handled 5,034 tonnes of cargo traffic in December 1996, a decrease of 11.3 percent on the same month in 1995, airport authority figures show.
Geneva's 1996 air cargo traffic totalled 63,871 tonnes, down 7.3 percent on 1995 levels.

Postal traffic in December fell by 9.7 percent on the same month in 1995 to 917 tonnes while 1996 volume as a whole fell by 2.6 percent on the previous year's levels to 8,910 tonnes. - Reuters Air Cargo Newsroom Tel+44 171 542 7706 Fax:5017
